attributes.action: Stop breeding of Staffordshire Bull Terriers or for Government to provide free service for dogs to be neutered or spayed for a few years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Staffordshire Bull Terriers are one of the most abandoned breeds in UK. Battersea Dogs Home are overpopulated by Staffs (and im sure rescue centres all over the UK are too)as dogs are now being turning away as the breed has been over-bred. If we can cut down on the amount of Staffordshire Bull Terriers that are being bred we can give a lot of abandoned Staffs a home and hopefully this will stop a lot of dogs being put down.
